query.statement: INSERT INTO FSM_SINGLE_MENU_MST ( SINGLE_MENU_CD , MENU_NAME , MENU_CLASS , COST_TYPE , PHOTO_TITLE_1 , PHOTO_PATH_1 , SPHOTO_PATH_1 , PHOTO_TITLE_2 , PHOTO_PATH_2 , SPHOTO_PATH_2 , CUSER , CDATE ) VALUES ( #ds_in.SINGLE_MENU_CD# , #MENU_NAME# , #MENU_CLASS# , #COST_TYPE# , #PHOTO_TITLE_1# , #PHOTO_PATH_1# , #SPHOTO_PATH_1# , #PHOTO_TITLE_2# , #PHOTO_PATH_2# , #SPHOTO_PATH_2# , #g_EmpNo# , SYSDATE )
